data.lyric:
[ti:I'm Upset (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:I'm Upset (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]I'm Upset (Explicit) - Drake
[00:09.40]Yeah
[00:09.58]
[00:11.55]I'm working on dying
[00:12.32]I'm upset
[00:13.08]
[00:14.11]Fifty thousand on my head it's disrespect
[00:16.33]
[00:17.30]So offended that I had to double check
[00:19.34]
[00:20.40]I'ma always take the money over sex
[00:22.59]
[00:23.59]That's why they need me out the way
[00:25.17]What you expect
[00:25.87]
[00:27.47]Got a lot of blood and it's cold
[00:29.08]
[00:30.63]They keep tryna get me for my soul
[00:32.15]
[00:33.79]Thankful for the women that I know
[00:35.44]
[00:36.94]Can't go fifty fifty with no ho
[00:38.59]
[00:41.53]Every month I'm supposed to pay her bills
[00:43.89]And get her what she want
[00:45.08]
[00:45.87]I still got like seven years of doin' what I want
[00:48.18]
[00:49.00]My dad still got child support from 1991
[00:51.49]
[00:54.26]Outta time people love to pop a lot of sh*t then come around
[00:57.94]
[00:58.66]Word to Flacko Jodye he done seen us put it down
[01:01.09]
[01:02.17]N**gas askin' if I'm cool
[01:03.82]I'm upset
[01:04.39]
[01:05.51]Hunnid thousand on my head it's disrespect
[01:07.54]
[01:08.53]So offended that I had to double check
[01:10.66]
[01:13.26]You tryna check
[01:13.94]
[01:14.71]This is real life n**gas think we playin' chess
[01:17.14]
[01:19.73]So what's next
[01:20.43]
[01:21.84]Jump up out the bed like I'm possessed
[01:23.58]
[01:24.32]I go out on tour and I say I'm drinkin' less
[01:26.73]
[01:27.44]End up gettin' loose and gettin' pictures from my ex
[01:29.88]
[01:31.81]SMS triple x
[01:33.56]That's the only time I ever shoot below the neck skrr
[01:36.81]Why you keep on shootin' if you know that n**ga dead skrr
[01:40.08]That's the only kind of sh*t that gets you some respect
[01:42.69]
[01:44.27]Got a lot of blood and it's cold
[01:45.96]
[01:47.47]They keep tryna get me for my soul
[01:49.06]
[01:50.61]Thankful for the women that I know
[01:52.23]
[01:53.67]Can't go fifty fifty with no ho ayy ayy
[01:56.70]
[01:58.27]Every month she don't even love me she just puttin' on a front
[02:01.89]
[02:02.57]She gon' tryna settle outta court and make a run
[02:05.12]
[02:06.24]Then gon' ask me how I'm doin'
[02:07.72]I'm upset
[02:08.32]
[02:09.44]Half a million on my head I can't accept yeah
[02:11.99]
[02:12.69]'Least it makes me feel someone tried their best yeah
[02:15.11]
[02:15.82]Want to waste a half a million be my guest
[02:17.99]
[02:19.00]Made me wanna buy a vest and a tech skrr
[02:21.50]
[02:22.85]But I'm blessed I just checked
[02:24.28]
[02:25.90]Hate me never met me in a flesh
[02:27.99]Said she's got somethin's she gotta come here and collect
[02:31.21]That sh*t is in a box to the left to the left
[02:33.89]
[02:35.47]Got a lot of blood and it's cold
[02:37.13]
[02:38.60]They keep trynna get me for my soul
[02:40.29]
[02:41.82]Thankful for the women that I know
[02:43.49]
[02:44.96]Can't go fifty fifty with no ho
data.trans:
[ti:I'm Upset (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:I'm Upset (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:09.40]//
[00:09.58]
[00:11.55]我还在垂死挣扎
[00:12.32]我很生气
[00:13.08]
[00:14.11]拿五万块要我的人头 真的很不尊重人
[00:16.33]
[00:17.30]气死我了 我都不敢相信
[00:19.34]
[00:20.40]我一直觉得金钱比女人重要
[00:22.59]
[00:23.59]所以他们都想让我快点走开
[00:25.17]你还想怎样
[00:25.87]
[00:27.47]血液不停涌动 但温度极低
[00:29.08]
[00:30.63]那些人总是想要夺走我的灵魂
[00:32.15]
[00:33.79]感谢那些我认识的女人们
[00:35.44]
[00:36.94]我绝不会和女人情定一生
[00:38.59]
[00:41.53]每个月都要给她付清账单
[00:43.89]想要什么给她买什么
[00:45.08]
[00:45.87]我还有七年的时间可以随心所欲
[00:48.18]
[00:49.00]从一九九一年起 我爸爸就没有付过赡养费
[00:51.49]
[00:54.26]没时间了 大家都喜欢来我身边玩乐
[00:57.94]
[00:58.66]向Rocky问个好 我还记得你对我的好
[01:01.09]
[01:02.17]兄弟们都在问我过得如何
[01:03.82]我很生气
[01:04.39]
[01:05.51]拿十万块要我的人头 真的很不尊重人
[01:07.54]
[01:08.53]气死我了 我都不敢相信
[01:10.66]
[01:13.26]你想看看吗
[01:13.94]
[01:14.71]这就是现实生活 哥们儿还以为在玩游戏
[01:17.14]
[01:19.73]所以接下来会怎样
[01:20.43]
[01:21.84]从床上浮起来 仿佛我的身体被占据
[01:23.58]
[01:24.32]我开始巡演 我说我会少喝一点
[01:26.73]
[01:27.44]喝得酩酊大醉 大胆向前任索要照片
[01:29.88]
[01:31.81]限制级照片发出去
[01:33.56]那是我唯一一张没有露脸的照片
[01:36.81]人都死了 为什么你还一直朝他开枪
[01:40.08]只有这样你们才能尊重我
[01:42.69]
[01:44.27]血液不停涌动 但温度极低
[01:45.96]
[01:47.47]那些人总是想要夺走我的灵魂
[01:49.06]
[01:50.61]感谢那些我认识的女人们
[01:52.23]
[01:53.67]我绝不会和女人情定一生
[01:56.70]
[01:58.27]她一点都不爱我 每个月只知道要我的钱
[02:01.89]
[02:02.57]她就想找个机会带着钱跑掉
[02:05.12]
[02:06.24]然后回头问我过得好不好
[02:07.72]我很生气
[02:08.32]
[02:09.44]拿五十万块要我的人头 我不能接受
[02:11.99]
[02:12.69]但这至少让我觉得 你们尽力了
[02:15.11]
[02:15.82]想要浪费掉这五十万 随你便
[02:17.99]
[02:19.00]我都想买防弹背心和冲锋枪了
[02:21.50]
[02:22.85]但我有上帝保佑着我
[02:24.28]
[02:25.90]恨我吧 你根本见不到我
[02:27.99]她说她落下了东西 她要过来拿走
[02:31.21]在左边的盒子 左边的那个盒子里
[02:33.89]
[02:35.47]血液不停涌动 但温度极低
[02:37.13]
[02:38.60]那些人总是想要夺走我的灵魂
[02:40.29]
[02:41.82]感谢那些我认识的女人们
[02:43.49]
[02:44.96]我绝不会和女人情定一生
